name: Greek Yogurt Berry Bowl
instructions: Add Greek yogurt to a bowl
Top with fresh mixed berries
Sprinkle granola over the berries
Drizzle honey on top
Add chia seeds for extra nutrition
Serve immediately and enjoy

name: Avocado Toast with Eggs
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden brown
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Fry or poach the eggs to your preference
Spread mashed avocado on toast
Top with cooked eggs
Garnish with halved cherry tomatoes
Season with additional salt and pepper if needed

name: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Roast diced sweet potato with olive oil at 400°F for 25 minutes
Massage kale with a little olive oil and lemon juice
Drain and rinse chickpeas
Slice cucumber
Arrange all ingredients in a bowl
Drizzle with tahini dressing
Serve warm or at room temperature

name: Mediterranean Salad
instructions: Wash and dry mixed greens
Halve cherry tomatoes
Dice cucumber and red onion
Crumble feta cheese
Combine all vegetables in a large bowl
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano for dressing
Toss salad with dressing
Top with feta and olives
Serve immediately

name: Baked Salmon with Vegetables
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)
Cut vegetables into uniform pieces
Toss vegetables with olive oil, minced garlic, and seasoning
Place vegetables on a baking sheet
Season salmon with salt, herbs, and lemon juice
Add salmon to the baking sheet
Bake for 15-18 minutes until salmon flakes easily
Serve with lemon wedges

name: Turkey and Vegetable Wrap
instructions: Warm tortilla slightly to make it more pliable
Spread hummus evenly across the tortilla
Layer turkey slices over hummus
Add lettuce, sliced tomato, cucumber, and bell pepper
Top with sprouts
Roll tightly from one end, tucking in sides
Cut in half diagonally
Serve immediately or wrap for later

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot
Sauté diced onion, carrots, and celery until soft
Add minced garlic and spices, cook for 1 minute
Add lentils and vegetable broth
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 20 minutes
Stir occasionally until lentils are tender
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Serve hot with crusty bread if desired

name: Apple Almond Energy Balls
instructions: Soak dates in warm water for 10 minutes if very dry
Process almonds in food processor until finely chopped
Add dried apples, dates, cinnamon, and vanilla
Process until mixture forms a sticky paste
Roll mixture into small balls
Roll balls in coconut flakes
Refrigerate for 30 minutes to firm up
Store in refrigerator for up to one week

name: Chia Pudding Parfait
instructions: Mix chia seeds, almond milk, maple syrup, and vanilla
Whisk well to prevent clumping
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight
Stir once after 30 minutes to prevent settling
Layer chia pudding with berries and granola
Top with coconut flakes
Serve chilled
Can be prepared up to 3 days ahead

name: Chicken and Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions
Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces
Prepare all vegetables by cutting into uniform pieces
Heat sesame oil in a large wok or skillet
Stir-fry chicken until cooked through, remove
Add vegetables, starting with harder ones first
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 1 minute
Return chicken to pan, add soy sauce
Serve over brown rice
